verses.roman:
nirjana-vane cale prabhu kṛṣṇa-nāma lañā
hasti-vyāghra patha chāḍe prabhure dekhiyā

synonyms: nirjana-vane—in a solitary forest; cale—walks; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛṣṇa-nāma lañā—chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; hasti—elephants; vyāghra—tigers; patha chāḍe—leave the path; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhiyā—seeing.
translation: When the Lord passed through the solitary forest chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa, the tigers and elephants, seeing Him, gave way.
